summary.para: Contains settings specific to an in-place editor that displays RTF data.
Initializes a new instance of the RepositoryItemRichTextEdit class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.Assign(DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItem)

summary.para: Copies the settings of the specified repository item.

member.param: A object or its descendant that represents the source of the operation.

summary.para: Gets whether the editor's height is calculated automatically to fit the editor's content. This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.CustomHeight

summary.para: Gets or sets the editor's height.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the editor's height, in pixels.

summary.para: Gets whether the editor's value can be changed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.EditorTypeName

summary.para: Gets the class name of an editor corresponding to the current repository item.

member.value: A value that identifies the class name of a corresponding editor.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.GetBrick(DevExpress.XtraEditors.PrintCellHelperInfo)

summary.para: Returns a brick object that contains information on how the current editor should be printed.

member.param: A object that provides information on the editor's state and appearance settings that will be used when the editor is printed.
member.returns: An object that provides information on how the current editor should be printed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.HorizontalIndent

summary.para: Gets or sets a horizontal margin between the border and text.

member.value: An integer value that specifies a horizontal margin, in pixels, between the border and text.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.MaxHeight

summary.para: Gets or sets the editor's maximum height.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the editor's maximum height, in pixels.

summary.para: Registers the current RepositoryItemRichTextEdit instance within the default Repository.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.Repository.RepositoryItemRichTextEdit.VerticalIndent

summary.para: Gets or sets a vertical margin between the border and text.

member.value: An integer value that specifies a vertical margin, in pixels, between the border and text.
